login.subtitle: 通过信任关系协调互助

step1.title: 你身边有关心你的人
step1.text: 这是一个社交组织工具。它不转账也不收款。它帮助人们在有人需要帮助时快速协调。

step2.title: 一个信号 — 合适的人就会知道
step2.text: 如果有人需要帮助 — 通知会送达能够响应的人。只发送一次。没有骚扰，没有压力。

step3.title: 一切公开透明
step3.text: 每个操作都有记录。信任建立在透明之上，而非控制。

step4.title: 添加你的第一个联系人
step4.text: 组织工具通过人与人之间的连接运作。从一个人开始 — 一个你信任的人。

landing.heroSubtitle: A social coordination tool — activating latent social connectivity into a p2p environment of mutual aid and direct cooperation
landing.whatDescription: Not a platform, not a service, not a product — a tool for activating previously latent social connectivity into a functional social environment. A p2p notebook that forms a reference registry.
landing.cardHandshakeDesc: Mutual confirmation of an existing meaningful social connection between two participants. Up to 150 connections (Dunbar's number).
landing.cardObligationDesc: A voluntary public pledge by a participant to provide financial help to a specific person with a specific recorded amount.
landing.cardTransparencyDesc: All activity is open. Reputation is not a rating — it is the sum of recorded facts of a participant's actions, visible to all.
landing.step1Desc: Formalize your existing meaningful social connections. Every handshake is mutual and voluntary.
landing.step2Desc: Create a collection when you need help. The network is notified through chains of confirmed handshakes.
landing.step3Desc: Participants take obligations voluntarily. No pressure, full transparency.
landing.howFootnote: Degree of connection is an informational parameter showing distance in a chain of confirmed handshakes — who is whose "friend of a friend of a friend"
landing.principleEqualityDesc: All participants are equal. No structural advantages of one participant over another.
landing.principleSelfOrgDesc: Mutual aid and direct cooperation emerge as a consequence of structure, not as prescribed functions.
landing.principleOpenDesc: Code is open, freely replicable, contains no single point of failure, is a reproducible description of architecture.
landing.ctaTitle: Ready to activate your p2p mutual aid environment?
landing.footer: Social Organizer — an open p2p mutual aid and direct cooperation tool
landing.cardIntentionDesc: A voluntary decision to help. No pressure — everyone decides for themselves whether to participate.

hints.collectionAmount: Enter the amount you need. Minimum 10 units. The system will notify the right number of people.
hints.collectionChatLink: Link to a chat (Telegram, WhatsApp, etc.) where you can coordinate with those who respond.
hints.intentionAmount: Amount you're willing to provide. This is an intention, not a transfer — coordination happens in the chat.
hints.profileBio: Tell a bit about yourself. This helps other participants get to know you better.
hints.profilePhone: Phone is only visible to your direct connections (first handshake).
